message:
More than a thousand Montanans gathered in front of the state Capitol of Helena on Monday to protest budgetary plans to cut health, educational, environmental and labor programs while pushing for corporate tax cuts.

‎"Republicans in Montana are pushing legislation to gut the Montana Environmental Policy Act, reduce workers' compensation insurance, close the Montana Veterans Home in Columbia Falls, prevent the establishment of a state health insurance exchange, slash a number of health programs & cut funding to higher education in the state."

http://www.rawstory.com/rs/2011/02/22/montanans-protest-gop-assault-on-environmental-and-labor-programs/
